foreignData.name: Ersetzen // Erfinden
foreignData.text: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Spontanzauber- und/oder einer Hexerei-Karte, zeige sie offen vor, nimm sie auf deine Hand und mische dann deine Bibliothek.

foreignData.name: Invert // Invent
foreignData.text: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de instantáneo y/o una de conjuro, muéstralas, ponlas en tu mano y luego baraja tu biblioteca.

foreignData.name: Inversion // Invention
foreignData.text: Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte d'éphémère et/ou de rituel, révélez-les, mettez-les dans votre main et mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.

foreignData.name: Invertire // Inventare
foreignData.text: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta istantaneo e/o una carta stregoneria, rivelale e aggiungile alla tua mano, poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.

foreignData.name: 反転 // 観点
foreignData.text: あなたのライブラリーからインスタント・カード最大１枚とソーサリー・カード最大１枚を探し、公開してあなたの手札に加え、その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。

foreignData.name: 도치 // 발명
foreignData.text: 당신의 서고에서 순간마법 카드 한 장 및/또는 집중마법 카드 한 장을 찾아 공개하고, 당신의 손으로 가져간 후, 당신의 서고를 섞는다.

foreignData.name: Inverter // Inventar
foreignData.text: Procure em seu grimório um card de mágica instantânea e/ou um card de feitiço, revele-o, coloque-o em sua mão e depois embaralhe seu grimório.

foreignData.name: Инверсия // Изобретение
foreignData.text: Найдите в вашей библиотеке карту мгновенного заклинания и (или) карту волшебства, покажите их, положите их в вашу руку, затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.

foreignData.name: 翻转 // 翻新
foreignData.text: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张瞬间和／或一张法术牌，展示这些牌，将它们置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

foreignData.name: 翻轉 // 翻新
foreignData.text: 從你的牌庫中搜尋一張瞬間和／或一張巫術牌，展示這些牌，將它們置於你手上，然後將你的牌庫洗牌。

name: Invert // Invent
originalText: Search your library for an instant card and/or a sorcery card, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: If you chose two targets, Invert switches the power and toughness of one creature and it switches the power and toughness of another creature. It doesn’t switch one creature’s power with another creature’s power.

Effects that switch a creature’s power and toughness apply after all other effects, regardless of when those effects began to apply. For instance, if you cast Invert targeting a 1/2 creature then give it +2/+0 later in the turn, it’s a 2/3 creature, not a 4/1 creature.
While resolving Invent, you could put no cards, an instant card, a sorcery card, or an instant card and a sorcery card into your hand.

text: Search your library for an instant card and/or a sorcery card, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
